name: Ari In Wonderland: monArchy Track 2 (ULTRA EDITION)
name_original: Ari In Wonderland: monArchy Track 2 (ULTRA EDITION)
description:
Play Episode 0 Before playing this one.

The first part is a prequel where we learn about Ari's past and how she met Aqila Coil. Ari must defeat Greendae of the spades region. He is pretty touch and has a big army, can you help Ari in her quest to become the ruler and fix Wonderland.

UPDATE 4.0.0

- New backgrounds

-UI background

-Main menu

-Game menu

- Dialogue change

- Changed spelling errors

- Menu music

- New character models

- Fixed Slater glitch  (again)

- New soundtrack
